successes.title: CHASM
successes.description: Chasm is a 2D Platform Adventure featuring procedurally generated Metroid-like dungeons and authentic pixel art.

Pledges.description: Receive a DRM-free copy of Chasm when it is released on Windows, Mac and Linux ● Exclusive sword "Gildian Blade"

EARLY BIRD: All the above rewards ● Early Access ● Access to the private Developer forum to help us improve the game ● Exclusive sword "Vipera Blade" ● A digital copy of the soundtrack ● An extra copy of the finished game for a friend

All the above rewards ● Early Access ● Access to the private Developer forum to help us improve the game ● Exclusive sword "Vipera Blade" ● A digital copy of the soundtrack ● An extra copy of the finished game for a friend

All the above rewards ● Chasm Compendium PDF (game art, development notes, strategy guide and tabletop gaming module) ● Exclusive Blue Canary familiar to help you ● Exclusive Elven Sword and Necklace ● A thank you in the game's credits
All the above rewards ● Kickstarter-exclusive American Apparel Chasm T-Shirt ● Main Cast Sticker Set (5) ● Limited Edition Chasm Magnet
All the above rewards ● Signed full-color 10x8" Hardback copy of the Chasm Compendium ● Enemy Sticker Set (5) ● 1" 'Status Effect' Button Pin Set (4)

All the above rewards ● One of our talented artists will design a fully-animated pixelized character of you based upon a photo that you send us. You will be e-mailed a digital version to use as your avatar on your favorite social media sites!

All the above rewards ● Become an NPC (Non-Player Character) in the game. Your animated pixel character from the $500 Tier will be turned into an interactive NPC with your very own line of dialogue. You will await players in a secret tavern hidden in the dungeons of the final game along with the other backers of this reward tier.

All the above rewards ● Work with us to design your very own enemy that will appear in the final game. You will have the chance to work directly with the development team and bring your own creation to life!

All the above rewards (minus appearing in the dungeon tavern) ● Become a legend in the world of Chasm and receive your own shrine hidden somewhere in the depths. Your pixelized NPC will sit upon a golden throne, speak multiple lines of custom dialogue, and bestow a special blessing of your choosing upon players lucky enough to find you.
